data.question: What is the empirical formula of Pb3(SC6H4S)3(en)2?
What is the yield of Pb2(S2C6H2S2)(en) when reacted with 1,2,4,5-benzenetetrathiol?
Is Pb3(C6S6) semiconducting?
What method was used to solve the structure of Pb3(SC6H4S)3(en)2?
What is the crystal system of Pb3(SC6H4S)3(en)2?
What temperature was used for the variable-temperature conductivity measurements of Pb3(C6S6)?
data.answer: Measurements were taken at various temperatures, following a cooling rate of 1 K/min and a heating rate of 2 K/min.

data.question: Does the synthesis of Pb3(SC6H4S)3(en)2 involve a reversible reaction?
What is the activation energy for the conductivity of Pb3(C6S6)?
Was thallium-doped Pb3(C6S6) synthesized?
data.answer: Yes, using a mixture of ∼99:1 Pb(OAc)2 and Tl(OAc).

data.question: What is the role of ethylenediamine in the synthesis of these compounds?
data.answer: Ethylenediamine acts as a solvent and participates in the formation of the network solids.

data.question: Is the bonding in Pb3(C6S6) similar to that in an inorganic solid-state compound?
What is the crystal system of Pb3(C6S6) as determined by synchrotron X-ray powder diffraction?
What is the yield of Pb3(SC6H4S)3(en)2 from its synthesis?
What is the significance of the variable-temperature conductivity measurements?
data.answer: They help determine the semiconducting properties and activation energy of the material.

data.question: Is the synthesis of these network solids air-sensitive?
What is the role of cork in the synchrotron X-ray powder diffraction measurements?
data.answer: Cork is used to lower the absorption of the sample and to lessen the chance of preferred orientation.

data.question: What is the crystal system of Pb2(S2C6H2S2)(en)?
Can Pb2(S2C6H2S2)(en) be considered semiconducting based on its properties?
data.answer: No, its conductivity is less than 10^-12 Ω^-1 cm^-1.

data.question: What is the purpose of using a hydraulic press in the preparation of samples for conductivity measurements?
data.answer: To press the material into pellets for conductivity measurements.

data.question: Is the bonding in Pb2(S2C6H2S2)(en) indicative of molecular units?
